name: Moo Bat Comet Storm
description:
An intensely tedious comet dodging collection game.

Based on characters from Matt Cox's Kapow-i Go Go.

Based on likeness from Tara Pacheco and Evan Malty.

Costumes by Josh Boerman.

For fans of the show our hero's rival-since-they-were-babies first initial may be helpful in completing your mission.

Programming and Art: @edbles

Sound from Freesound.org:

Level Music:
